articles.title: Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to Foodstuff Factory of KPA
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Provides Field Guidance to Foodstuff Factory of KPA
 Pyongyang, November 16 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and  first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, provided field guidance to Foodstuff Factory No. 354 of the KPA.
					 The factory with a total plottage of at least 6 900 square meters is a foodstuff processing base for mass-producing confectionary and bread for service personnel. 
					
					 Officials of the factory told Kim Jong Un in an excited tone that its employees were speeding up production after voluntarily coming out to the factory at the thought that he would surely visit their work site on the Day of Mothers.  
					
					 He with a broad smile on his face extended warm congratulations to the working women of the factory on the day. 
					
					 Kim Jong Un looked round the room dedicated to its history.
					
					 He said the factory developed into a food processing base specializing in the production of high-quality confectionary and bread for service personnel under the meticulous guidance and care of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Going round various places of the factory including biscuit, bread and zeppole shops and cultural hall of the factory, he learned in detail about the progress made in its modernization, production and cultural and emotional life of its workers.
					
					 He praised the factory for putting all production processes including command, monitoring and control on the basis of automation by intensifying the drive for pushing back the frontiers of the latest science and technology so as to hit its high goals for its updating true to the intention of the party. He personally tasted biscuit, saying it looks attractive and is tasty.
					
					 Noting that the factory, though small in production area,  is raising work efficiency and improving quality of products while using not big work force and cutting down production cost as less as possible, he stressed this is ascribable to the   modernization of its production processes as desired by the party.
					
					 Saying he was satisfied to visit the factory, he highly appreciated it as an icon factory and a model foodstuff factory to be proud of.
					
					 Noting that women workers are engaged in pleasant labor at the factory where cultured practice is established in production and life, he repeatedly said the factory is very excellent.
					
					 He extended thanks to all workers of the factory on behalf of the Supreme Commander of the KPA for providing tasty and nutritious foodstuffs to service personnel after updating it and boosting production as intended by the party.
					
					 Expressing expectation and belief that the workers of the factory would as ever fulfill their honorable duties so that the service personnel might call them mothers, he had a photo session with them.
					
					 He was accompanied by KPA Vice Marshal Choe Ryong Hae, director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, KPA General Jang Jong Nam, minister of the People's Armed Forces, KPA Col. General So Hong Chan, first vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces, and Hwang Pyong So, vice department director of the Central Committee of the WPK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Visits Football Training Ground of Mangyongbong Sports Team
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Visits Football Training Ground of Mangyongbong Sports Team
 Pyongyang, November 16 (KCNA) -- Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, visited the football training ground of the Mangyongbong Sports Team now in the process of creation.
					  He said he made sure that the football training ground of the sports team was covered with artificial turf as a model for providing well various football stadiums and playgrounds across the country with sports facilities as required by an international standard, adding that he visited it to learn about how the work is being done.
					
					 Watching the turf on the ground, he was very pleased with it as its quality is as good as natural turf. He noted that it is good to cover the fields of the football stadiums with quality artificial turf so that footballers may have sufficient trainings and matches regardless of seasons.
					
					 When fields of football stadiums and playgrounds are covered with artificial turf, players and school youth and children will be able to have good physical exercises and landscape will change, he added.
					
					 He underscored the need to build a base for massively producing quality artificial turf in order to spruce up the football stadiums and playgrounds across the country like the football training ground of the above-said sports team, specifying tasks and ways to do so.
					
					 He was accompanied by KPA Vice Marshal Choe Ryong Hae, director of the General Political Bureau of the KPA, KPA General Ri Yong Gil, chief of the General Staff of the KPA, KPA General Jang Jong Nam, minister of the People's Armed Forces, Han Kwang Shang, department director of the Central Committee of the WPK, Hwang Pyong So and Ma Won Chun, vice department directors of the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: WPK Delegation Returns
articles.content:
WPK Delegation Returns
 Pyongyang, November 16 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea led by Ri Yong Chol, vice department director of the WPK Central Committee, returned home on Saturday after visiting France and participating in the 15th international meeting of the communist parties and workers' parties held in Lisbon, Portugal.

articles.title: DPRK Telecom Delegation Leaves for Bangkok
articles.content:
DPRK Telecom Delegation Leaves for Bangkok
 Pyongyang, November 16 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Ministry of Posts and Telecommunications headed by Minister Sim Chol Ho left here on Saturday to participate in the Asia-Pacific Summit and the 2013 World Telecom Exhibition to be held in Bangkok.

articles.title: Delegation of Grand People's Study House Leaves for China
articles.content:
Delegation of Grand People's Study House Leaves for China
 Pyongyang, November 16 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Grand People's Study House led by President Sin O Sun, left here on Saturday to participate in the 1st Asian Forum of Chief Librarians to be held in China.

articles.title: Gift to Kim Jong Un from Russian Figure
articles.content:
Gift to Kim Jong Un from Russian Figure
 Pyongyang, November 16 (KCNA) -- Supreme leader Kim Jong Un received a gift from the general director of the Prom Grazhdan Proyekt Co. Ltd., of Russia.
					 The gift was handed to the DPRK ambassador to Russia by General Director N. N. Velkin on Nov. 1.

articles.title: Mothers' Day Marked in DPRK
articles.content:
Mothers' Day Marked in DPRK
 Pyongyang, November 16 (KCNA) -- The Mothers' Day has been significantly marked in the DPRK.
					 Mothers across the country visited the statues of Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill and their statues and large portraits in other various places.
					
					 They visited the bust of anti-Japanese war hero Kim Jong Suk at the Revolutionary Martyrs Cemetery on Mt. Taesong and her statues in Kim Jong Suk County and Hoeryong City and looked back upon the exploits performed by her for the country, revolution and humankind.
					
					 The drama "Female Comrade of Mt. Paektu" was given by the National Theatrical Troupe at the National Theatre here.
					
					 The performance truthfully showed the transparent spirit of devotedly defending the leader and the revolutionary comradeship displayed by Kim Jong Suk in the days of the anti-Japanese war.
					
					 The Samjiyon Band of the Mansudae Art Troupe and the National Symphony Orchestra separately gave a music and dance performance and a concert at the East Pyongyang Grand Theatre and the Moranbong Theatre.
					
					 Pyongyangites watched with joys and interest performances and films at the Pyongyang Circus Theater, Taedongmun Cinema, Songyo Cinema and other places.
					
					 Meetings with women of distinguished services and sports and amusements games were held in every district of Pyongyang.
					
					 Performances given by provincial art troupes and art squads and schoolchildren and kindergartens were conspicuously held in every province, city and county.
					
					 Members of the South Hamgyong Provincial Committee of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea held amusement games at  Hamhung Stadium.
					
					 There took place art performances and meetings at theatres, cinemas and halls of Kaesong and Munchon cities, Pakchon County and other cities and counties and songs and laughing were heard at parks and recreation grounds.
					
					 Mothers received letters of greetings from their sons and daughters serving in the army and working at socialist construction sites on the Mothers' Day.
					
					 The public catering establishments including Okryu, Chongnyu, Chilsong and Sinhung restaurants and Kanggye Noodle House pleased mothers with good service.

articles.title: "Selected Works of Kim Jong Il" (Enlarged Edition) Vol. 22 off Press
articles.content:
"Selected Works of Kim Jong Il" (Enlarged Edition) Vol. 22 off Press
 Pyongyang, November 16 (KCNA) -- Vol. 22 of "Selected Works of Kim Jong Il" (enlarged edition) was brought out in the DPRK. 
					 Contained in the book are 46 works published by Kim Jong Il from August, Juche 92 (2003) to November, Juche 95 (2006).
					
					 In the works he advanced the important guidelines in invariably inheriting the tradition of "the Down-with-Imperialism Union" (DIU) and in firmly adhering to and applying the revolutionary principle and the class principle.
					
					 Clarified in the works is the idea that to firmly defend the socialist country of Juche is the most important revolutionary task faced by the People's Army.
					
					 The works deal with theoretical and practical issues arising in effecting a revolutionary turn in the socialist economic construction and in improving the people's living standard.
					
					 Also expounded in the works are the ways of implementing the policy of the Workers' Party of Korea on bringing about a drastic turn in agriculture including the issues of directing big efforts to farming to increase the grain production, developing the stock-breeding in a big way and giving a face-lifting to the rural villages.
					
					 The works indicate tasks to thoroughly implement the WPK's line on attaching importance to science and technology including the issues of making a great leap forward in the development of science and technology, enhancing the role of scientists and technicians and raising the knowledge level of officials and other people.
					
					 In the works he called upon officials to arm themselves with the idea of believing in the people as in Heaven and live and struggle like leading officials in the days when the foundations for carrying forward the Juche cause were laid and thus serve the people and contribute to pushing ahead with the general advance of the Songun revolution.
					
					 Also contained in the book are works which give answers to the theoretical and practical issues arising in building a thriving nation including the issues of bringing about a new turn in the construction of the capital, enhancing the role of writers and journalists and encouraging and developing national food.

articles.title: DPRK Artistes Prove Successful at International Concours
articles.content:
DPRK Artistes Prove Successful at International Concours
 Pyongyang, November 16 (KCNA) -- Artistes of the Korean People's Internal Security Forces Song and Dance Ensemble, Song Kyong Op and Paek Song Hyok, proved successful at the 8th international instrumental players concours that was held in Sankt-Peterburg, Russia from November 7 to 11.
					 The concours brought together at least 70 instrumental players from seven countries including the DPRK, Russia, Belarus and Uzbekistan.
					
					 Divided into five categories such as bayan, accordion and piano, students, teachers and artistes had first and second contests.
					
					 Paek and Song showed excellent rendition in bayan duet in the instrumental ensemble category to be highly acclaimed by the jury and the audience.
					
					 They played several famous music pieces in the bayan and accordion solo category.
					
					 At a closing ceremony on November 11 Korean artistes were awarded the certificate for the special prize and special cup in the instrumental ensemble category. Song Kyong Op was awarded the certificate and cup for the first place in the bayan and accordion solo category while Paek the certificate for the second place in the same category.

articles.title: Short Track Speed Skating Contest of National Championships Held
articles.content:
Short Track Speed Skating Contest of National Championships Held
 Pyongyang, November 16 (KCNA) -- A short track speed skating contest of the national championships took place at the Ice Rink from Monday to Friday.
					 Kim Chol Gwang from the Pyongyang Railway Bureau Sports Team and Ju Yun Mi from the Hwaebul Sports Team placed first in men's and women's 500m events respectively. Choe Un Song from the Jangjasan Sports Team and Kim Jong Mi from the Jangsan Sports Team came first in 1,000m events.
					
					 Om Chol and Kim Jong Mi from the Jangsan Sports Team finished first in men's and women's 1,500m events while Kim Chol Gwang and Choe Sung from the Pyongyang Railway Bureau Sports Team came first in 3,000m events.
					
					 The Pyongyang Railway Bureau Sports Team and the Hwaebul Sports Team won titles in the men's 5,000m relay and women's 3,000m relay events respectively. 
					
					 The Pyongyang Railway Bureau Sports Team and the Hwaebul Sports Team placed first in men's and women's team standing respectively.

articles.title: Papers Call upon Mothers to Fulfill Their Responsibility in Era of Songun
articles.content:
Papers Call upon Mothers to Fulfill Their Responsibility in Era of Songun
 Pyongyang, November 16 (KCNA) -- All mothers across the country should fulfill their responsibility and duty in the ongoing general advance in the era of Songun.
					 Papers Saturday say this in editorials dedicated to the Mother's Day.
					
					 There are many mothers in the world but there are no such upright, pure, faithful and devoted mothers as the Korean mothers, Rodong Sinmun says, and goes on:
					
					 Thanks to such mothers the revolutionary ranks of the DPRK stand unfazed by any storm and stress and beautiful traits are prevalent in its socialist society. It is the great pride of the Korean revolution that the Songun revolutionary fighters who have grown under the warm care of the admirable mothers are playing the role of fortress and shield defending the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) and the leader.
					
					 The country and revolution are making a dynamic advance toward a new victory in the drive for building a thriving nation, demonstrating their invincible might. This is ascribable to the devotion of the mothers who are leading their children along the road of revolution and patriotism, linking their lives with the destiny of the country and revolution and devoting themselves to the great cause of the country and the nation.
					
					 The WPK made sure that the Mother's Day is significantly marked amid the blessings of the whole country, valuing and projecting the mothers. This marks a historic event making it possible to significantly exalt the dignity and position of the mothers and bring about a turn in playing their role.
					
					 The care of the WPK represents that of the great mother who ensures the happiness of the generations to come, being responsible for the destiny of all mothers and children and all other people, the benevolent care which all mothers of this land call that of the mother and follow her. 
					
					 Minju Joson calls upon all mothers to devote their energies, wisdom and enthusiasm to the efforts to win a final victory in the drive for building a thriving nation and thus fully demonstrate once again the staunch spirit of the Korean women in the era of Songun.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Terms Principal Plan for Development of South-North Relations One for Confrontation
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Terms Principal Plan for Development of South-North Relations One for Confrontation
 Pyongyang, November 16 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Saturday in a commentary terms the "second principal plan for the development of south-north relations" a heinous plan for confrontation in which the south Korean authorities concealed their criminal intention to ignite a war against the DPRK after derailing the inter-Korean relations.
					 The present south Korean authorities made the second plan for confrontation with the DPRK. This is an open declaration to stand in confrontation with the DPRK till the end of their tenure of office after refusing dialogue and cooperation.
					
					 They set the settlement of the "nuclear issue of the north" and the institution of the "law on human rights of the north" as the policy of the inter-Korean relations and submitted it to the "National Assembly". This is an unpardonable anti-reunification racket as it aimed to legally and institutionally fix the confrontation with the DPRK and thereby push the inter-Korean relations to a total collapse.
					
					 We cannot but take a serious note of the fact that the puppet group deleted all provisions related to the October 4 declaration which were contained in the first plan. This suggests the intention of the present ruling forces to go frantic in the moves for confrontation with the DPRK, being opposed to the implementation of the inter-Korean declarations in the whole period of their tenure of office just as the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors did.
					
					 The puppet group is resorting to a sleight of hand to whitewash the document for confrontation while crying out for "resuming south-north economic cooperation and examining the allowance of investment in the north". But such a poor rhetoric will not work on anyone.

articles.title: U.S. Accused of Taking Issue with DPRK over Its War Deterrence
articles.content:
U.S. Accused of Taking Issue with DPRK over Its War Deterrence
 Pyongyang, November 16 (KCNA) -- The U.S. secretary of Defense, addressing an international seminar on security held in the U.S. recently, said that north Korea is a state posing the greatest threat to the Asia-Pacific region, it makes future unpredictable and there exists in north Korea the potential danger which can lead to a large-scale conflict involving the U.S., China and Russia.
					 The commander-in-chief of the U.S. Armed Forces in the Pacific, referring to the nuclear missile "threat" from the DPRK, spread a rumor that it threatens the regional peace and stability.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes in a commentary this is nonsensical sophism.
					
					 All threats wrecking world peace are coming from the U.S., the commentary says, and goes on:
					
					 What the U.S. seeks is to justify its moves against the DPRK and meet its sinister purpose by charging the DPRK with "wrecking peace" at any cost.
					
					 The U.S. arms buildup and war maneuvers in the Asia-Pacific region are posing a great threat to those countries in the region. Not a few countries in the region are opting for increasing military capabilities to cope with the U.S. military threat. The danger of a new arms race and possible military conflict lingers in the region. Nevertheless, the U.S. is taking issue with the DPRK, a shameless ploy to conceal its true colors as the wrecker of the regional peace and stability and shift the blame onto the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. is releasing a false report against the DPRK. This is a challenge to the DPRK. The U.S is seriously mistaken if it thinks it can deceive the world and attain its aim with such a poor trick.
					
					 It is the invariable goal of the DPRK to protect the peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula and in the Asia-Pacific region.
					
					 The U.S. authorities should clearly face up to the situation and stop freely wagging their tongues.

articles.title: Minju Joson Flays S. Korean Puppet Group's Anti-DPRK Outpourings
articles.content:
Minju Joson Flays S. Korean Puppet Group's Anti-DPRK Outpourings
 Pyongyang, November 16 (KCNA) -- After the publication of the answer given by the spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea to the question put by KCNA as regards the reckless remarks made by Park Geun Hye during her European junkets, minions of the south Korean Ministry of Unification are busy groundlessly slandering it. They jabbered that it is disgraceful for the north to speak ill of Park through official institution and media and it should stop such accusation of its own accord."
					 Conservative media echoed their utterances, stoking confrontation. 
					
					 Minju Joson Saturday observes in a commentary in this regard: 
					
					 It is a publicly recognized fact that during her European junkets Park malignantly hurled mud at the DPRK, revealing her ulterior intention to escalate the confrontation.
					
					 This found a vivid expression in a series of her silly behaviors. Wherever she went, she cried out for "the north's dismantlement of its nukes" and "solution to the human rights issue" and earnestly implored West European countries to specify them in joint documents. Not content with this, she shamelessly visited the European Union to ask it "to render sustained cooperation in the international efforts to lead the north to dismantling its nukes and making changes." She did so, unaware of where she stood and lost to shame.
					
					 One may call the answer given by the spokesman for the CPRK very polite one when compared with Park's backbiting. It is beyond doubt that she keeps mum about it. However, those minions of the ministry and her other yes men are getting frantic with groundlessly hurling mud at the north. 
					
					 The word "disgraceful" uttered by them might be misplaced. It is odd indeed that they uttered the word to us though it was appropriate to Park. They might please the chief executive through such politically motivated fraud but it was only ill-fame that the ministry earned for their despicable behavior.
					
					 The south Korean regime would be well advised to behave itself, bearing in mind that its backbiting against others would only bring to light its ugly colors.

articles.title: S. Korean Ruling Party Slammed for Resorting to Arbitrary Practices
articles.content:
S. Korean Ruling Party Slammed for Resorting to Arbitrary Practices
 Pyongyang, November 16 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Voice of People on Nov. 13 carried an editorial titled "Saenuri Party seized with ambition for one-party dictatorship".
					 The editorial said that the "Saenuri Party" decided to examine the issue of referring to the court the "law on advanced operation of the National Assembly", citing its illegality. The "Saenuri Party" complained that the operation of the NA at present does not accord with the spirit of the constitution and it cannot leave such NA operation as intact, the editorial noted.
					
					 It is a laughing stock that the party is crying out for bringing the suit over the illegality of the law which the NA passed through its session last year saying it opened up the way of advanced operation of the NA, the editorial ridiculed.
					
					 If the law is revised as pressed for by the party, it will set the stage for the ruling party to handle all the bills unilaterally, it said, commenting it will be a candid attitude to insist on the one-party dictatorship.
					
					 As evidenced by the ceaseless moves to dissolve the trade unions and progressive opposition parties as what was done in the period of the past military dictatorship, the departed soul of the one-party dictatorship is reviving, the editorial deplored.

articles.title: S. Korean Lawyers Protest Regime's Suppression of Jongyojo
articles.content:
S. Korean Lawyers Protest Regime's Suppression of Jongyojo
 Pyongyang, November 16 (KCNA) -- At least 380 lawyers and professors of laws affiliated to the Bar Association for Democratic Society and the Democratic Law Institute in south Korea held a press conference in Seoul on Nov. 11 in protest against the puppet authorities' suppression of the Teachers Union (Jongyojo).
					 They accused the Park Geun Hye regime of labeling Jongyojo as an "unlawful union" citing the fired workers who retain their union membership under the regulations of the organization as pretext.
					
					 This is the abuse of power quite contrary to the common sense, they denounced.
					
					 They warned that the regime would meet the inevitable public punishment as it was engaged in illegal acts in disregard of the people.
					
					 It should immediately stop the suppression of Jongyojo, they said.

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Assailed for Pursuing Dictatorial Politics
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Assailed for Pursuing Dictatorial Politics
 Pyongyang, November 16 (KCNA) -- The Solidarity for Democracy, People's Life, Peaceful Reunification and Sovereignty of south Korea issued a statement on Nov. 13 denouncing the puppet regime for moving to disband the Unified Progressive Party (UPP).
					 The statement accused the Park Geun Hye regime of looking to disband the UPP by threatening even the Constitutional Court after freezing society with the restoration of the "yusin" dictatorship.
					
					 The Ministry of Justice is threatening to take a step to ban opposition parties from conducting activities, blaring that there are concerns that the free democratic basic order can be encroached upon till the decision is taken to disband the UPP, it charged.
					
					 It condemned the Park Geun Hye regime for pursuing the dictatorial politics.
					
					 In fact, the law has long been violated by the dictatorship of the "Saenuri Party", it held.
					
					 The Park regime should clearly remember that the sword of dictatorship against democracy will surely precipitate the ruin of the dictatorial forces, it warned.

articles.title: Probe into Truth about Illegal Election Demanded in S. Korea
articles.content:
Probe into Truth about Illegal Election Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, November 16 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Emergency Situation Council to Denounce Intelligence Service's Interference in Presidential Election for Political Operation called a press conference in Seoul on Nov. 13, in which it declared an action to probe the truth about the illegal election.
					 It said the election last year was illegal as the IS, the Ministry of Defense and other major power organs interfered in it.
					
					 It said that it would hold a people's court under the sponsorship of the Bar Association for Democratic Society in order to bring the people to the knowledge of the truth behind the election conducted by use of the government power.

articles.title: Committee for Remembering Generalissimo Kim Jong Il Formed in DR Congo
articles.content:
Committee for Remembering Generalissimo Kim Jong Il Formed in DR Congo
 Pyongyang, November 16 (KCNA) -- A DR Congo committee for remembering Generalissimo Kim Jong Il was inaugurated in Kinshasa on November 6.
					 Otete Gaston Mboyo, deputy general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the DR Congo and chairman of the DR Congo-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Association, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee decided to release a bulletin and organize colorful political and cultural events including remembrance meeting and film show on the occasion of the 2nd anniversary of the demise of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Committee for Remembering Kim Jong Il Inaugurated in Egypt
articles.content:
Committee for Remembering Kim Jong Il Inaugurated in Egypt
 Pyongyang, November 16 (KCNA) -- An Egyptian committee for remembering General Secretary Kim Jong Il was inaugurated on Nov. 12.
					 Yehia Zakaria Khairullah, vice-chairman of the Socialist Freedom Party of Egypt, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee set the period for remembering Kim Jong Il from Nov. 12 to Dec. 17 and decided to hold political and cultural events for praising his noble career and undying exploits.

articles.title: Committee for Remembering Kim Jong Il Formed in Hungary
articles.content:
Committee for Remembering Kim Jong Il Formed in Hungary
 Pyongyang, November 16 (KCNA) -- A Hungarian committee for remembering Comrade Kim Jong Il was formed in Budapest on Nov. 11.
					 Gyula Thurmer, chairman of the Hungarian Workers' Party, was elected chairman of the committee.
					
					 The committee set the period from November 11 to December 18 as remembrance period and decided to hold diverse political and cultural events to widely introduce the undying revolutionary exploits of Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Whole Life Dedicated to Cause of Global Independence
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Whole Life Dedicated to Cause of Global Independence
 Pyongyang, November 16 (KCNA) -- The whole life of General Secretary Kim Jong Il was the life of a great revolutionary totally dedicated to the people's happiness, prosperity of the country and cause of global independence.
					 Otete Gaston Mboyo, deputy general secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of the DR Congo and chairman of the DR Congo-Korea Friendship and Solidarity Association, said this at the inaugural ceremony of the DR Congo Committee for Remembering Generalissimo Kim Jong Il held on November 6.
					
					 He said:
					
					 Humankind will soon commemorate the second anniversary of the demise of Kim Jong Il, who made an immortal contribution to accomplishing the cause of global independence.
					
					 He developed in depth the Juche idea founded by President Kim Il Sung into the guiding idea in the era of independence through his energetic ideological and theoretical activities and thus provided the revolutionary people struggling for justice and truth with a powerful ideological and theoretical weapon.
					
					 He turned the DPRK into an invincible socialist power and helped the world progressive people dynamically step up the building of  new society free from exploitation and oppression with firm faith in the Juche idea.
					
					 The immortal exploits performed by him on behalf of the era and history will shine long along with the cause of global independence.
					
					 We pay high tribute to Kim Jong Il, a genius of thought and theory, and prominent statesman.
					
					 Progressive humankind will steadily advance along the road of Juche and independence indicated by him.

articles.title: Anti-DPRK Racket of U.S., S. Korean Authorities Slammed in Germany
articles.content:
Anti-DPRK Racket of U.S., S. Korean Authorities Slammed in Germany
 Pyongyang, November 16 (KCNA) -- The Franken Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of Germany released a statement on Nov. 8 in protest against the U.S. hostile moves against the DPRK and the south Korean puppet authorities' crackdown upon the progressive forces. 
					 The U.S. staged joint naval maneuvers in waters off the Korean Peninsula with even a nuclear-powered carrier involved, again escalating tension, the statement said, and went on:
					
					 Such saber-rattling is an open nuclear threat and provocation to the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. should stop all sorts of provocations to the Korean people and respect their independent right.
					
					 The south Korean conservative group subservient to U.S. imperialism is desperately kicking up an anti-DPRK racket, pursuant to the U.S. policy, while scheming to forcibly dissolve the Unified Progressive Party at home.
					
					 It is the intention of the group to deter the progressive forces from growing strong.
					
					 This once again proves that "democracy" touted by the south Korean puppet authorities is hypocritical, indeed.
					
					 The upper echelon of the south Korean regime is a group of traitors seeking to stay in power through alliance with imperialism and servants of international financial plutocrats.
					
					 We strongly demand the south Korean authorities immediately stop their suppression of the progressive forces and work for the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un recibe regalo de personalidad rusa
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un recibe regalo de personalidad rusa
Pyongyang, 16 de noviembre (ACNC) -- El Mariscal Kim Jong Un recibio regalo que le dirigiera el director general de la Compania LTD. Prom Grazhdan Proyekt de Rusia.
					  El director general N. N. Yelkin lo entrego el dia primero al embajador coreano en Rusia.

articles.title: En RPDC celebran Dia de la Madre
articles.content:
En RPDC celebran Dia de la Madre
Pyongyang, 16 de noviembre (ACNC) -- En la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea se celebra significativamente el Dia de la Madre. 
					Las madres de todo el pais visitaron las estatuas de bronce de los Generalisimos Kim Il Sung y Kim Jong Il y sus imagenes con amplia sonrisa instaladas en sus respectivas localidades. 
					
					Ante el busto de la Heroina de la Lucha Antijaponesa Kim Jong Suk en el Cementerio de Martires Revolucionarios en el monte Taesong y sus estatuas de bronce, erguidas en el distrito Kim Jong Suk y la ciudad de Hoeryong, las mujeres recordaron las proezas de la Generala del monte Paektu realizadas por la patria, la revolucion y la humanidad. 
					
					En el Teatro Nacional de Drama de esta capital tuvo lugar la funcion de drama del Conjunto Dramatico Nacional "La camarada del monte Paektu".
					
					La funcion demuestra de modo emocionante el firme espiritu de defensa a ultranza del lider y la camaraderia revolucionaria manifestados por la Heroina Kim Jong Suk en aquellos dias de la lucha armada antijaponesa. 
					
					En el Gran Teatro de Pyongyang Este y el Teatro Moranbong, la Banda Samjiyon del Conjunto Artistico Mansudae y la Orquesta Sinfonica Nacional ofrecieron la funcion de musica y danza y el concierto, respectivamente. 
					
					Los capitalinos pasaron momentos alegres en el Circo de Pyongyang, el Cine Taedongmun, el Songyo, etc.
					
					En los municipios de esta capital se realizaron el encuentro con las mujeres benemeritas y los juegos deportivos y recreativos.
					
					En todas las provincias, ciudades y distritos se ofrecieron las funciones artisticas de los conjuntos artisticos provinciales, grupos de propaganda artistica provinciales y ninos  escolares e infantiles. 
					
					Las integrantes de la Union de Mujeres Democraticas de Corea en la provincia de Hamgyong del Sur hicieron los juegos recreativos. 
					
					Se efectuaron en las ciudades y distritos de todas las localidades, inclusive la ciudad de Kaesong, la de Munchon y el distrito de Pakchon, las funciones artisticas, encuentros de felicitacion y escenas de orgullo. 
					
					Con motivo de este dia, los hijos en los puestos militares y los campos de construccion socialista enviaron las cartas de felicitacion a sus madres.
					
					El Restaurante Okryu, el Chongryu, el Chilsong, el Sinhung, el de Fideo de Kanggye y otros establecimientos de servicios gastronomicos de todo el pais atendieron con mucha amabilidad a las madres.
